channel.title: Cli on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Cli on Arrans github.io

item.title: go-subcommand
item.description: Generates dependencyless go command line argument subcommand system

item.title: pimtrace
item.description: A CLI tool for preforming queries on ical, maildir, mbox and csv files

item.title: mdsplit
item.description: Splits markdown files into chunks suitable for processing with other tools or making into slides

item.title: git-tag-inc
item.description: Yet another semantic version incrementor and tagger for git

item.title: anytype-to-linkwarden
item.description: Simple application for migrating AnyType bookmarks to Linkwarden

item.title: mvcommon
item.description: Tool for moving files into a folder where they have a common prefix

item.title: mostcomm
item.description: A cli utility for finding the most common and sorting by length, lines-sets in a text file

item.title: podcast-cdr-manager
item.description: CLI tool to help manage podcast subscriptions for burning to CDROMs / CDR / CDRW

item.title: sentencestats
item.description: Tools to plot character usage in sentences

item.title: move-dups-script
item.description: Simple program to move dups nothing really interesting - Once off go project which could have been a shell script

item.title: trace-redirects
item.description: Very simple cli tool for tracing redirects on a site - nothing you couldn’t do with curl
